sentences.en: Any effective opposition to a totalitarian regime must be secretive and cellular.
sentences.cn: 任何有效反对极权主义统治的组织必须是秘密的,分散成各个单元的.

sentences.en: From the mob is drawn the leadership of totalitarian movements.
sentences.cn: 极权运动的领导层就从这些乌合之众中产生.

sentences.en: In actuality, the monetary system has a vehicle for division and totalitarian control.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 货币体系已成为车辆司和极权控制.

sentences.en: In the realm of totalitarian kitsch , all answers are given in advance and preclude any questions.
sentences.cn: 在极权主义的庸俗作品里, 所有的答案都提前给出并产生了新的问题.

sentences.en: New public figures suddenly abound in the hitherto faceless totalitarian tableaux ( John McLaughlin )
sentences.cn: 在从前是一张白板的专制时代的画面上突然涌现出众多的知名人士(约翰麦克劳夫林 )

sentences.en: North Korea is mainly known for a totalitarian regime overseeing economic failure.
sentences.cn: 众所周知,在极权体制的掌控下,朝鲜的经济状况十分糟糕.

sentences.en: The totalitarian era is passing, its old ideas blown away like leaves from an ancient, lifeless tree.
sentences.cn: 极权主义时代正在过去, 它那陈旧的观念,如同无生命的古老树木上的树叶,被吹得脱落飘零.

sentences.en: The totalitarian world even finds symbols of love and worship an affront.
sentences.cn: 极权主义者甚至认定爱和信仰的象征是一种侮辱.

sentences.en: They would then be free to impose their will and spread their totalitarian ideology.
sentences.cn: 这样一来,他们就可以肆无忌惮地把自己的意志强加于人,传播他们的极权主义意识形态.

sentences.en: Unless we have a totalitarian world order, someone will design improved humans somewhere.
sentences.cn: 除非极权主义控制世界, 否则就会有人在某处设计出改进了的人种.

sentences.en: We think that Green's theory is a kind of liberal theory, not totalitarian theory.
sentences.cn: 认为格林的学说是自由主义学说而非极权主义理论.

trans.tran_en: based on a political system in which ordinary people have no power and are completely controlled by the government
